08-03.title: . . . TO BE OF SERVICE
08-03.quote: Our real purpose is to fit ourselves to be of maximum service to God and the people about us.
content: It is clear that God's plan for me is expressed through love. God loved me enough to take me from alleys and jails so that I could be made a useful participant in His world. My response is to love all of His children through service and by example. I ask God to help me imitate His love for me through my love for others.
